description: Tunes, technology and temperature control, this all-mountain helmet challenges all standards for safety and comfort. Its hybridized design combines the best characteristics of hard-shell construction and in-mould designs. The result is a helmet with dynamic qualities that delivers improved shock absorption in a light package. All that jazz, plus you get 22 vents to adjust open or closed. It's all-day riding comfort no matter what side of the mountain you're on.Advanced Hybrid Shell design takes elements of hard-shell and in-mould construction for dynamic protection.Multi-directional Impact Protection System protects your brain from rotational forces.Integrated impact shields offer increased protection at vulnerable areas.EPS inner absorbs and dissipates shock in the event of an impact.22 dial-adjustable vents let you control the airflow.Dial fit allows easy and quick adjustment for all-day comfort.Quick dry liner can be removed for easy washing.Magnetic chin buckle releases to the side.Audio compatible.
name: SWEET PROTECTION Switcher MIPS Helmet - Unisex
